text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

(──There are Sakuya and Mei over there.
I wonder what they're talking about...)

So, my little brother got mad, you know~...
I said sorry like a ton, though.

He probably didn't want his beloved
big sister to go on the training camp, huh?

Yeah, cause I had promised to go out with him~...
Gotta do something when I get back...

He used to get over being mad quickly
when we were kids, but now, geez, he's a handful.

Haha, that's quite an intriguing story.
I'm an only child myself.

Homes with siblings seem lively and fun,
don't they? I envy that.
Ahaha, really~?

My family, they're all super noisy,
and we get into fights sometimes~?
But those kind of fights are something to aspire to, you know?

Is that so~?
Then, how about we do something like a fight~?
Huh...?

Hahaha, just kidding~ But, I do want to get along that well~
To fight like that~ is what they say, right?♪

Hehe, that's true... the training camp is still ongoing.
Let's keep deepening our bond even more.
(──Doesn't seem like they're too worried.)
